ID, USER_ID, GOODS_ID, CHILD_GOODS_ID, CART_COUNT, CREATE_TIME, ADD_PRICE
select
from sc_goods a,sc_child_goods b,sc_cart c where a.id=b.goods_id and c.goods_id=a.id and c.child_goods_id=b.id and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
